Legislative History of Laws

For Law 17-346, see notes following ยง 7-2121.

DC CODE ยง 7-2122

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Department of Health, in collaboration with the Board of Medicine and the Board of Pharmacy, shall develop medically and factually accurate written information regarding prophylactic antibiotics for the treatment of sexually transmitted diseases and emergency contraception for the prevention of pregnancy due to sexual assault.
The Department of Health shall disseminate the written information produced pursuant to subsection (a) of this section to all hospitals in the District.

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Victims of Sexual Assault Emergency Care.
